TRIGGER_INTRO: At the beginning of your end step,
At the beginning of combat on your turn,
CREATURE_TRIGGER: deals combat damage to a player
ACTIVATED_EFFECT: Target creature gains vigilance until end of turn.
Target creature gains hexproof until end of turn.
Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
PRIME_DIRECTIVE_COND: if no opponent was dealt combat damage this turn and you didn’t target a permanent an opponent controls this turn
VOID_COND: if a nonland permanent left the battlefield this turn or a spell was warped this turn
LANDER_RULES: It’s an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle."
WARP_REMINDER: Warp {COST} (You may cast this spell for its warp cost. If you do, exile it at the beginning of the next end step. You may cast it from exile on a later turn.)
CLOAK_REMINDER: Cloak N — {COST}. (Activate only as a sorcery.) This permanent phases out. At the beginning of your next untap step, it phases in with N cloak counters on it. It has hexproof while it has a cloak counter. Whenever it attacks or becomes the target of a spell or ability, remove a cloak counter from it.

W: Prime Directive — At the beginning of your end step, if the Prime Directive condition was met, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.
B: Void — This creature gets +1/+1 as long as the Void condition is true.
